General.Name: PT Indo Boga Sukses Tbk
General.Description: PT Indo Boga Sukses Tbk owns and operates European themed D'Monaco restaurant in Indonesia. Its D'Monaco restaurant offers wedding reception, birthday celebration, anniversary, pre-wedding photoshoot, bridal shower, board and corporate meeting, arisan, fashion show, fine dining, and other social events. The company also operates Sofia residence, which offers residences with European taste; and owns and operates Insom lounges. In addition, it is involved in the fish processing business; operation of Legal Resto, a café that offers food and drinks with live music entertainment; and exporting activities. The company was founded in 2019 and is headquartered in Sleman, Indonesia. PT Indo Boga Sukses Tbk operates as a subsidiary of PT Goldman Investindo Sedaya.
